abstract: Looking for the Mumbai street staple in New York
snippet: Looking for the Mumbai street staple in New York
lead_paragraph: There's something in the genetic makeup of every Indian which sparks nagging pangs for street food. On a late summer morning, as a strong breeze softened the stifling humidity, my husband Mahir and I had our cravings fulfilled on the Williamsburg waterfront. Our vado pav sandwich was a perfectly balanced mix of spicy, tangy, crispy and chewy, and took my husband back to his childhood in Mumbai, where he grew up spending his spare rupees on this snack.

headline.main: The World's Best Vada Pav, N.Y.C. Edition
